hadiths.text: A’ishah said “In what was sent down in the Qu’ran ten suckling’s made marriage unlawful, but they were abrogated by five known ones and when the Prophet (ﷺ) dies, these words were among what was recited in the Qur’an.”

chapter.ara-name: باب هَلْ يُحَرِّمُ مَا دُونَ خَمْسِ رَضَعَاتٍ
chapter.eng-name: Does Breastfeeding Less Than Five Times Establish Fosterage?
